name: eyeful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] an amount of something, usually dust or dirt, that has entered the eye: eyeful of As the lorry went past, I got an eyeful of grit.
[ S ] informal a very noticeable or attractive sight, often a sexually attractive person: She's quite an eyeful.
